languages.text: "Брайс, нам надо сократить путь — сверься с планами корабля. Штейн — проверь мельта-заряд. Клейтон — держи медкоплект наготове, Вита-Тета может требоваться экстренная помощь".
"Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho-Theta may require urgent medical attention."
languages.original_text: "Брайс, нам надо сократить путь — сверься с планами корабля. Штейн — проверь мельта-заряд. Клейтон — держи медкоплект наготове, Вита-Тета может требоваться экстренная помощь".

traits.locale_text: "Bryce, we need a shorter path. Consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready. The Rho Theta may require urgent medical attention."
"Bryce, we need a shorter path. Consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready. The Rho Theta may require urgent medical attention."
"Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho Theta may require urgent medical attention."
"Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho Theta may require urgent medical attention."
"Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho-Theta may require urgent medical attention."
"Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho-Theta may require urgent medical attention."

languages.text: "Bryce, wir brauchen einen kürzeren Weg ... checken Sie die Schiffspläne. Stein, Melterladung prüfen. Clayton, Medikit bereit halten – Rho-Theta könnte dringende medizinische Hilfe brauchen."
languages.original_text: "Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho-Theta may require urgent medical attention."

traits.locale_text: "Bryce, wir brauchen einen kürzeren Weg ... checken Sie die Schiffspläne. Stein, Melterladung prüfen. Clayton, Medikit bereit halten – Rho-Theta könnte dringende medizinische Hilfe brauchen."

languages.text: « Il nous faut un chemin plus court, Bryce. Consultez les plans du vaisseau. Stein, vérifiez la charge à fusion. Clayton, préparez un médikit. L'escouade Rho-Thêta pourrait avoir besoin d'une aide médicale d'urgence. »
languages.original_text: "Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho-Theta may require urgent medical attention."

traits.locale_text: « Il nous faut un chemin plus court, Bryce. Consultez les plans du vaisseau. Stein, vérifiez la charge à fusion. Clayton, préparez un médikit. L'escouade Rho-Thêta pourrait avoir besoin d'une aide médicale d'urgence. »

languages.text: «Bryce, necesitamos una ruta más corta: consulte los planos de la nave. Stein, compruebe la carga de fusión. Clayton, vaya preparando un botiquín; puede que Ro-Zeta precise atención médica urgente».
languages.original_text: "Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho-Theta may require urgent medical attention."

traits.locale_text: «Bryce, necesitamos una ruta más corta: consulte los planos de la nave. Stein, compruebe la carga de fusión. Clayton, vaya preparando un botiquín; puede que Ro-Zeta precise atención médica urgente».

languages.text: “布莱斯，找条更短的通道，查一下飞船结构图。斯坦因，检查热熔炸弹。克莱顿，准备好急救箱，西塔小队可能需要需要紧急医疗支援。”
languages.original_text: "Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho-Theta may require urgent medical attention."

traits.locale_text: “布莱斯，找条更短的通道，查一下飞船结构图。斯坦因，检查热熔炸弹。克莱顿，准备好急救箱，西塔小队可能需要需要紧急医疗支援。”

languages.text: 「ブライス、もっと短いルートが必要だ。船の設計図を確認しろ。スタイン、メルタ爆薬を点検しろ。クレイトン、メディキットを準備しておけ。『ローシータ』が緊急治療を必要とするかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho-Theta may require urgent medical attention."

traits.locale_text: 「ブライス、もっと短いルートが必要だ。船の設計図を確認しろ。スタイン、メルタ爆薬を点検しろ。クレイトン、メディキットを準備しておけ。『ローシータ』が緊急治療を必要とするかもしれない」

languages.text: "Bryce, bize daha kısa bir yol lazım. Geminin şemalarına göz at. Stein, melta bombasını kontrol et. Clayton, sıhhiye çantasını hazırla. Rho-Thita'nın acil tıbbi müdahaleye ihtiyacı olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Bryce, we need a shorter path — consult the ship's schematics. Stein, check the melta charge. Clayton, keep a medikit ready — Rho-Theta may require urgent medical attention."

traits.locale_text: "Bryce, bize daha kısa bir yol lazım. Geminin şemalarına göz at. Stein, melta bombasını kontrol et. Clayton, sıhhiye çantasını hazırla. Rho-Thita'nın acil tıbbi müdahaleye ihtiyacı olabilir."
